startStreamingConfirm: Are you sure you want to start streaming?
stopStreamingConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop streaming?
badPathError: Invalid Path or Connection URL.  Please check your settings to confirm that they are valid.
connectFailedError: Failed to connect to the streaming server.  Please check your internet connection.
disconnectedError: Disconnected from the streaming server.  Please check your internet connection.
attemptingToReconnect: Stream has disconnected, attempting to reconnect.
invalidStreamError: Could not access niconico account information or stream key, please make sure you logged in to niconico if you wish to stream niconico, otherwise double-check your stream key. If it is correct, there may be a problem connecting to the server.
noSpaceError: There is not sufficient disk space to continue recording.
unsupportedError: The output format is either unsupported or does not support more than one audio track. Please check your settings and try again.
endStreamInStreamingConfirm: Are you sure you want to exit while live?
notBroadcastingMessage: There is no program to start streaming on. Make a program on niconico live service.

broadcastStatusFetchingError.default: Failed to get information on streaming server.  Please check your internet connection.
broadcastStatusFetchingError.httpError: Failed to get information on streaming server. (%{statusText})

bitrateFetchingError.title: Failed to get bitrate
bitrateFetchingError.message: Failed to get bitrate on server. Please check your internet connection.

optimizationForNiconico.title: Optimize simple settings
optimizationForNiconico.description: Optimize simple settings to deliver Nicolive.

nicoliveProgramSelector.title: Select a program

providerTypeSelect.title: Select a program type
providerTypeSelect.description: Select a type of the program you will start streaming to.

channelSelect.title: Select a channel
channelSelect.description: Select a channel you will start streaming on from the list.

programSelect.title: Select a program
programSelect.description: Select a program you will start streaming to.

confirm.title: Confirmation
confirm.description: You will start streaming to the following program.

nicoliveProgramSelector.noChannelPrograms:
There is no program on the selected channel.
Create a program on the channel or make sure you selected a correct channel.

doNotShowAgainOptimizationDialog: Do not show this dialog again
